title: Heidi Klum is planning something very special this Halloween
text:
Heidi Klum is planning something very special this Halloween

Cape Town - Supermodel Heidi Klum has confessed she feels under pressure to "outdo" herself with her Halloween outfit.



The 46-year-old is famous for her annual Halloween party and her eye-catching and over the top costumes.

From transforming into Princess Fiona from Shrek in 2018 to channelling Betty Boop in 2002, Heidi always goes all out.

READ MORE: 7 Heidi Klum Halloween costumes to get you in the mood for All Hallows' Eve

In an interview with ET Online, the television personality revealed that she feels some pressure this year.

The annual party which she first hosted in 2000 will be celebrating a big anniversary, and she wants to do something very special.

"I'm trying to do something very special on that day, because it's 20 years already. I can't believe it! 20 years ago, I thought, "There is no real cool party in New York City and someone has to do this.' And so I did," said Heidi.

On Saturday, Heidi teased her costume on Instagram. In the video, she is wearing a blue brain headpiece.

SEE THE VIDEO HERE:

On Thursday, Heidi and her husband, Tom Kaulitz, wore matching fireworks costumes to Paris Hilton's party in Beverly Hills.

SEE THE PIC HERE:

Compiled by Leandra Engelbrecht. (Sources: ET Online, Bang Showbiz)
description: Heidi Klum is famous for her annual Halloween party and her eye-catching and over the top costumes.
